parameters.query:
WITH input AS (
  SELECT $1::uuid AS usuario_id
),
base_meta AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(xp_recompensa, 150) AS xp_recompensa
  FROM public.metas_catalogo
  WHERE codigo = 'xp_base_quest'
  LIMIT 1
),
bonus_meta AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(xp_recompensa, 30) AS xp_recompensa
  FROM public.metas_catalogo
  WHERE codigo = 'xp_bonus_recorrencia'
  LIMIT 1
),
quest_raw AS (
  SELECT
    uq.*,
    COALESCE(uq.config->>'titulo', 'Quest personalizada') AS titulo,
    COALESCE(uq.config->>'descricao', 'Continue avançando na sua jornada.') AS descricao,
    NULLIF(uq.config->>'prioridade', '') AS prioridade,
    NULLIF(uq.config->>'recorrencia', '') AS recorrencia,
    COALESCE((uq.config->>'xp_recompensa')::int, base_meta.xp_recompensa, 150) AS xp_calculado
  FROM public.usuarios_quest uq
  JOIN input i ON i.usuario_id = uq.usuario_id
  CROSS JOIN base_meta
),
quest_ranked AS (
  SELECT
    quest_raw.*,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
      ORDER BY
        CASE quest_raw.status
          WHEN 'ativa' THEN 0
          WHEN 'pendente' THEN 1
          ELSE 2
        END,
        COALESCE(quest_raw.atualizado_em, quest_raw.ativado_em) DESC NULLS LAST
    ) AS ordem
  FROM quest_raw
),
quest AS (
  SELECT * FROM quest_ranked WHERE ordem = 1
),
snapshot AS (
  SELECT
    uc.usuario_id,
    uc.total_quests_concluidas,
    uc.total_quests_personalizadas,
    COALESCE(uc.xp_base, 0) AS xp_base_sum,
    COALESCE(uc.xp_bonus, 0) AS xp_bonus_sum,
    uc.atualizado_em
  FROM public.usuarios_conquistas uc
  JOIN input i ON i.usuario_id = uc.usuario_id
)
SELECT
  'quest'::text AS bloco,
  i.usuario_id AS user_id,
  q.id AS quest_id,
  q.titulo,
  q.descricao,
  q.status,
  q.prioridade,
  q.recorrencia,
  q.progresso_atual,
  q.progresso_meta,
  q.progresso_percentual,
  q.xp_calculado,
  q.atualizado_em,
  snap.total_quests_concluidas,
  snap.total_quests_personalizadas,
  snap.xp_base_sum,
  snap.xp_bonus_sum,
  bonus_meta.xp_recompensa AS xp_bonus_recorrencia,
  base_meta.xp_recompensa AS xp_base_default
FROM input i
LEFT JOIN quest q ON q.usuario_id = i.usuario_id
LEFT JOIN snapshot snap ON snap.usuario_id = i.usuario_id
CROSS JOIN base_meta
CROSS JOIN bonus_meta;
